channel.title: Blogdown on My Blog Site
channel.description: Recent content in Blogdown on My Blog Site

item.title: R 博客搭建
item.description: 1.1 安装 R RStudio IDE Pandoc (If not install RStudio) 1.1.1 安装 package—blogdown ## Install from CRAN install.packages("blogdown") ## Or, install from GitHub if (!requireNamespace("devtools")) install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("rstudio/blogdown") 1.1.2 安装 Hugo静态网站生成器 # helper function in blogdown to download and install it automatically on
